div.p:
Curia balliuorum de Abirdene In pretorio eiusdem xvij die augusti
quo supra

Eodem die Johannes mvnk in Amerciamento Curie ex confessione proprie lingue
pro perturbio Johannis mvnk consanguinej suj Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt

Eodem die Johannes mvnk inuenit Alexandrum prat plegium legalem quod Johannes
mvnk consanguineus suus erit Indempnis pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris
Et Idem Johannes Junior inuenit Johannem malisone quod dictus Johannes senior
erit Indempnis pro eo aliter quam per viam Juris

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxj die augusti
quo supra

The samyn day Duncan smitht grantit him borghe for xxtj s' to Alexander
menyeis for Johne brogane

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxv die Augusti
quo supra

The saide day thomas Waus oblist him be his hand to Entir rolland'
of fentone befor' thame one friday that next cumis in this tolbutht
befor' nowne to ansuer' to Androu branche for strubulance and dissobeinge
of him as he allegis And falyeinge in the entiring' of him the said
day the saide thomas to ansuer to him the saide day

The saide day margaret litstar douchtir to thomas litstar of the greyne
oppinly declarit exponit and Schew that scho hede nay richt nor'
clame nor' writ evidencis nor' yeit Enteres in nay to the lande perte
ning to vmquhile hir saide fadir quhilk is sauld' to gilbert litstar
and he in Sesin of It nochtwithstandinge Jonhne Colisone forspekar
to the saide gilbert askit and requirit the said' margaret to schew gif
scho hed ony sesin or richt to he said lande and he suld' decist
tharfra to the quhilkis the said margaret declarit scho had nay thingis
to say to the said lande bot hir fadir had resone to do with his
land that plesis' him

The said day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Alexander chamer
of murchill forspekar that the wyf of thomas mar' wranguit in the
avay taking' of the demi nethis fra the wattir of furdis fra the fischingis
quhilk vpverk fra thomas menyes and suld' haue funde him
marrouschipe for the quhilkis scho was in ane Amerciament of the court and
to Amend as law will

the said day the action' debatabile betuix Jonhne of Cullan and Johne
Waus in futy anent j barrel of Salmond' is continevit for wak
nes of the Court quhill sonday that next cumis eftir the tenour'
of the ak maid tharapone obefor'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxviijo
die Augusti anno quo supra

Eodem die Rollandus fentone amerciatur pro perturbio Andree branche ballivi
ex ore Robertj blinsel prelocutoris assise Cuj emendabit ut Jura volunt
Et Idem Andreas amerciatur per pro perturbio dicti rolland Cuj emendabit ut Jura
volunt dictus Rollandus amerciatur pro perturbio Katerine fraser Cuj emendabit
ut Jura volunt Et Alexander branche amerciatur pro perturbio dicti rollande et cetera

Eodem die Robertus Cullane deuenit plegius legalis quod andreas branche matheus et
Alexander branche branche erunt Indempnes pro se Rolland fentone et parte sua aliter quam
per viam Juris Et patricius rede deuenit plegius legalis quod dictus Andreas
Rollandus erit Indempnis pro se et parte sua aliter quam per viam Juris Et
quilibet dictarum parcium obligatur ad releuandum plegium suos Indempnes
de huiusmodi fideiussione per manuum ostensionem

Curia balliuorum de abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem vltimo die
augusti anno quo supra

The saide day Dauid atkin was in ane Amerciament of the Court for the
wranguis' haldin of tua Stane of woll the best that was in
the loft fra Jonhne of Kintor and aw to deliuer and pay the saide
woll et cetera to the saide Jonhne of the best of woll that he saw
in the loftis be ane Suorne assis' thomas Symson' forspekar

The saide day the borghe Strekit one William Stile be
Jonhne menyes that he fulfillit nocht his bill of waringe fand'
with him in Danskin of ane Stik of claret wyne was
nocht of waile and the said' William quyt of his challance be
ane Suorne assis' Alexander chamer of murchill forspekar

The saide day the borghe' Strekit one James Kennartj
yongar be thomas Waus that he fulfillit nocht his bill fand
in Danskin was of nayne of availe and the saide James
quyt of his challance

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem quarto die
Septembris anno Domini et cetera nonagesimo quinto

The saide day murthow blak grantit him avand' j stane of woll
to Jonhne talyour' Dauidis sone to be pair or ellis the price of
It in money be michaelmes day next to Cum

The saide day comperit Alexander chamer in the schipraw offeringe him
redy to preyve the rude malys aucht to him be Jonhne Colison'
and becaus' the saide Jonhne was nocht present he protestit for Remed
of law

the saide day the hukastaris was ale conuikit for byinge of
ale froitis eggis buttir and vthir Stuff or the tone be seruit

The said' day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis' Johne
of Cullane forspekar that the borghe' strekit be patrik leslie one
Jonhne blabir' that he had nocht fulfillit his bill of waringe
send' in Danskin was fundin of waile for the quhilkis the said
Jonhne was in Amerciament of the courtis And atour It was deliuerit that
the saide Jonhne sal mak ane new bile of Rekning and deliuer
to the said patrik one monunday that next cumis that be trew
as he wile ansuer' for

The saide day Jonhne blabir' requirit the assis' to declar' the
burdis per clamit be patrik leslie ande protestit to be quyt of
his challance tharanent in tyme to Cum

the saide day thomas Jamesone was conuikit be ane suorn'
assis' Jonhne' of Cullan forspekar for strubulance of the courte

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem vijo
die Septembris anno quo supra

the said day It was deliuerit and ordanit be the balyeis
and diuers' of the Consal that thomas Jamesone for the offence
done to Isabell Waus sal sitt done vpon his kne and ask
hir forgevnes And gif euire tha he committis ony offence
be him self be his wyf or barnes that he may lett
he sal neuir beir' office of this tone that beinge preuit
to the quhilkis bath the said partiis was oblist be thar'
handis vphaldin

the said day the balyes dischargit and quiet'clamit Robert
blinsel of vj li' x s' and v d' of his maile of his demi nethis
of the Raik of this Instant yer quhilkis was assignit
to sere Jonhne ruthirfurd'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiudem xj die
Septembris quo supra

the saide day thomas Sadlar' was in ane Amerciament of the Court
be his avne tonge grantit for the wranguis' Strubulance
of Androw nachtj officiar' in the excercione and execucion of his
office and to amend' as law wile and forber' in tym to Cum

The saide day the balyeis and mast part of the Consale present
for the tyme grantit and consensit to pay be the haile
tone to Alexander chamer yongar tene markis Scottis money
for the seruing of the office of Abbat of bonacord' for this
Instant yer' and the yeris bigane

The saide day It was ordanit ande deliuerit be the mast part
of the Consale that Jonhne of Culane sal pay the maile of
the demi nethis fisching of the Raik pertening to vmquhill besy Setone of
this yer' becaus' he occupeit the fischinge for the quhilkis
thai ordanit and decretit that scho nor' nayne vthiris sale haue
tak of wattir nor' land' quhil thar malys be pait

The saide day It was deliuerit be the Consal for the strubulance
done to Androw nachtj officiar' in the execucion of his office
that thome Sadlar' sal putt his crag in the goyf and gif euire
he committis ony offence to the saide Androw or any vthir officiar'
in tyme to Cum he sal pay x li' to Sanct nicholes werk
vnforgevin

the saide day the dome of the borghe Strekit be fransy
Cullan one William henrisone for iij li' of fraucht and v s'
continevit to the next Court in hoip of concord'

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xij die
Septembris anno quo supra

The said day Androw lousone Cristj prat Robert flessar Robert
of futhes flessaris was in ane Amerciament of the court be thar'
avne grantis for the denyinge to brek flesche to the nichbouris
of the tone for thar' fee and to Amend as law will forber'
in tym to Cum

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvto
die Septembris anno quo supra

The saide day Jonhne of Cullane become Souerte be his
handis landis and gudis that the bigin and tenment pertening to James
Colisone liand' in the vuirkirkgate salbe Skathles for Johne
ramsay hatmakar and his partj vthirwais thane law will And'
in continent the saide Jonhe of Cullane renuncit the said' borrow
gang becaus' he coud' gett nay borrouis to fre him of this
borrougange

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane Suorne assis'
Alexander rede forspekar that William henrisone wrangis in the
haldin of ltj s' of fraucht tharof xl s' to franse Cullane
and x s' to Sanct nicholes werk

Eodem die matheus toschow amerciatur pro perturbio agnetis Duncansone et
dicta Agnes amerciatur pro perturbio dicti mathei et emendabunt
ut Jura volunt

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xvijo
die Septembris anno quo supra

The saide day thomas chapman grantit him borghe' for Alexander
scrogis to Williame blinsele yongar for vj merkis viij d' ij d'
In part of pament of ane gretar Some quhilkis the balyeis chargit
him to pay within terme of law And the said Alexander grantit him to releve
the saide thomas of the said Some

The saide day It was deliuerit be ane assis' Alexander chamer
forspekar that fransy Cullane sal pay or caus' to be pait to
Jonhne fechat xx s' and xix d' for his fee quhilkis the balyeis
chargit him to pay within terme of law

The said day Dauid atkin was quyt be ane Suorne assis'
Alexander chamer forspekar of ane Stane of woll follouit be mathow
branche

The said day William glassinwricht grantit him avinge four'
glassin windowis to Sanct nicholes queir' to be maid and
vpput deulie as efferis be Sonday eftir the fest of Sanct
michaele next hereftir

the saide day comperit Alexander chamer of murchill patrik gordone of
methtlik Alexander gray and Alexander arbeke procuratoris to ane nobile man
sere James ogiluy of Deskfurd' knicht and producit ane testimonial'
vndir the seile of Androw Cantulie ane of the balyeis of banff'
makinge mention' and schevin that Alexander robertsone burges of banf hed
wranguislie Intromettit with ane half nethis fischinge one the wattir
of Doverne pertening to the said' knicht be ane assedacion of the burges
of banf vndir thar' commone Sele and has wranguislie fischeit the
said wattir this Instant yer' and has avay takin and withhaldis
the fische and profitis of it quhilkis pertenis to the said knicht
as in the samyn mattir fullelie is contenit quhilk certifi
cacion rede herd and vndirstandin was decernit of avale for ony
thinge schevin in the contrar' and the said Alexander chamer procurator
as said is allegit that the four barrellis of Salmond beinge vndir
the kingis rest in futy was fischeit and takin in the said knichtis
wattir and was his avne propir gudis and askit ane lauchfule
day to be assignit to him to preiwe his allegeance Ande
the said Alexander Robertsone allegit the said four' barrelis Salmond his
propir' gudis and askit thame to borghe' offeringe redy to finde
Souerte to do for tham that efferit him of law And fande ane borghe
in the hande of henry Orvm ane of the officiaris of the said
burghe that he awche to haue the said iiijor barrelis Salmond' to borghe
quhilkis borghe' the said Alexander chamer procurator reconterit sayand'
he suld' nocht haue thame to borghe' becaus' thai war propir
gudis to the said knichtis and takin in his saide fischingis the said
partiis beinge remouit the Court riplie avisit assignit the
xix day of October' next to Cum to the said procuratouris to cum
within the said' tolbutht befor the balyeis for the tyme and preve
thar' allegeance And continevit the decision' of the said borghe
and Recontouris to the said day And cristj prat Come Souerte be
his hande that the said Alexander Robertsone suld' follou his said borghe
the saide day and place and he oblist him to fre the said cristj of
his borrougane be his hande vphaldin

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem xxvjo
die mensis Septembris anno quo supra

The saide day Jonhne blabir lauchfullie callit and nocht comperit
to ansuer' to the borghe' Strekit apon him be patrik leslie
that he has nocht gevin him ane sufficient bile of Rekning
of his gudis send with him in Danskin and aw to gif him
ane Sufficient bile and wrangis in the haldin of it herfor the balyeis
ordanit Androw nachtj sergeand' warn the said Johne to tak
ane streis' of the saide Jonhnis and lat it to borghe' and it be askit
And warne him to the law day as secund day of proces'

The saide day Comperit ane discret mane sere Alexander gray
chaplane of Sanctis crispini and crispinianeis altar situat' within
the parroche kirk of this burghe' Ande producit and schew ane
autentywe Instrument vndir the Subscripcion and Signe of
sere Jonhne Stirueling notar' public' and seile of thomas fyf
makinge mencion' and schevinge that the honest and fathtfule
mene of Craft Cordonaris of the said burghe' with ane consent
and assent in the honor' of gode almichtj the blissit virgine mary
Sanctis nicholes Sanctis crispinj and crispinianj ande al Sanctis
had' chosin and takin the said sere Alexander thar' perpetuale chaplan
to mak ministracion of dyvine seruice at the said altar as
efferis for the quhilkis thai war' bundin to Sustene the
said chaplane honestlie as efferis in meyttis drynkis
and Sustentacion Circualie be Sevin of the best and
worthiast of the said Craft Ilkane ane day in the Oulk
Ande payand to him xl s' vsual money of Scotland
yerlie to his fee of vthiris the Remanent of the Craft
as in the samyn mair' fullie is contenit quhilkis Instrument
Seyne and vndirstandin the haill cordonaris lauchfullie
warnit Callit and comperit the said chaplane humilie
menyt him to the aldirman balyeis and consal that he
wantit his fee and part of his dietis in the Oulk
beseking thame of Remede of law / quhilk peticion
the saidez aldirman balyeis consale and diuers' of Communite
vndirstandin richtuis' and consonant to resone with expres'
Consent ande assent of the best and worthiast of the
said craft ordanit fand' and' deliuerit the saide evident
of vaile and the said craftismen to Sustene thar' said chaplane
honestlie eftir the tenour' of the samyn Ande maide and ordanit
thomas meldrum and Williame ranisone deknys and mastiris
of the said craft in that parte to compell and distrenye thar' nich
bouris craftismen and cordonaris to the Sustentacion of thar' said
chaplane eftir the tenour' of his evident

Curia balliuorum de Abirdene tenta In pretorio eiusdem xxviij die
Septembris anno quo supra

The said day It was deluerit deliuerit be ane suorne assis' sere
Jonhne ruthirfurd' forspekar that William philp is avinge xl s'
to Johne Colisone quhilkis the balyeis chargit him to pay within
terme of law

Curia balliuorum burgi de Abirdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem
vltimo die Septembris anno quo supra

div.head:
Nomina Inquisicionis I in deseruicione breuis
Johannis moir'
div.p:
Alexander chamer de murchill Alexander menyeis dominus Johannes ruthirfurd miles
Robertus blinsele Johannes Cullane Johannes Wormet Alexander mar' Willelmus
blinsele Jacobus Craike Alexander scrogis Johannes moir' patricius leslie
Richardus Waus thomas Waus et Robertus Cullane Jurati
dicunt quod quondam Willelmus moir' patruus Johannis moir' latoris presencium
obiit vltimo vestitus et sasitus ut de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini
nostri regis de quadam terra anteriore cum suis pertinenciis Jacente infra dictum
burgum in vico Castrj ex australi parte eiusdem vici inter terram Johannis
Wormet ex orientali parte ex vna et terram Jacobi Kintor ex occidentali
partibus ab altera et terram interiorem quondam henrici Crage versus
austrum et communionem viam regiam versus boriam Et quod dictus Johannes
est legittimus et propinquior heres dicti quondam Willelmi patruj suj de
dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime etatis Et quod dicta terra valet
nunc per annum xx s' et tantum valuit tempore pacis Et quod tenentur de
Suppremo nostro Rege per seruicium burgagium Et quod nunc existit
in manibus domini nostri regis per annum aut eocirca racione decessus
dicti Willelmi patruj suj in defectu verj heredis Jus suum minime prose
quentis

div.head: Nomina Ad Inquisicionem Walterj atkin
div.p:
Alexander chamer de murchile Alexander menyeis Johannes ruthirfurd' miles Robertus blin
sele Johannes Cullane Johannes Wormet Alexander mar Willelmus blinsel
Jacobus Craik Alexander scrogis Johannes moir' patricius leslie Richardus
Waus thomas Waus et Robertus Cullane Jurati dicunt quod
quondam Isabella Kintor mater Walterj atkin latoris presencium obiit
vltimo vestita et sasita de feodo ad pacem et fidem domini nostri
Regis de quadam terra Jacente infra dictum burgum in le chakerraw
inter terram gilberti Waus de many ex orientali ex vna et communionem
viam regiam ex occidentali partibus ab altera et terram thome
prat versus boriam et communionem viam regiam versus austrum
Et quod dictus Walterus est legittimus et propinquior heres eiusdem
quondam Isabelle matris sue de dicta terra cum pertinenciis Et quod est legittime
etatis Et quod valet nunc per annum xxtj s' et tantum valuit tempore
pacis Et quod tenetur in capite de Suppremo domino nostro Rege per
seruicium burgagium Et nunc existit in manibus domini nostri
Regis per Spacium trium mensium aut eocirca in defectu verj heredis
Jus suum hucusque minime prosequentis

The said day It was ordanit and deliuerit be the aldirman balyeis
Consal and diuers' of the communite present for the tyme that
William Ranisone and thomas meldrum sal vesy considir'
and vndirstand the craftismen cordonaris of thar' craft and
thar' werk craft als oft as thai think

The saide day the aldirman and diuers' of the consal and communite present
for the tyme thocht it expedient for the commone proffit for the
correction of evill werk maid' be the cordonaris and tersing and
reforming of It that William ranisone and thomas meldrum sal
vesie consider amd vndirstand the craftismen of thar' craft within this
burghe' and thar' werk diligentlie and to correk evile werk and
vnsufficient Stuff as the vys' is of vthiris burrowis And gif ony
dissobeis the saidez William and thomas herintill in contrar' the common
profit thai sal present the falt to the aldirman and balyeis quhilkis
sal pvnis tham eftir the lavis of the Realme and consuetude
of vthiris burrouis
